meanings.definition: The state of being complete or undivided.
meanings.sent1: The wholenesses of the puzzle made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent2: She admired the wholenesses of the beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick relied on the wholenesses of the deck of cards.
meanings.sent4: The team's success was due to the wholenesses of their collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The wholenesses of the melody filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being whole or unbroken.
meanings.sent1: The wholenesses of the vase made it valuable.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated the wholenesses of the antique mirror.
meanings.sent3: The child's story highlighted the importance of wholenesses in friendship.
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated the wholenesses of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The wholenesses of the forest brought peace to her mind.
